title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 21, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 21, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Websites / Web

*   [ArchWiki](https://wiki.archlinux.org/) - Arch Linux Wiki which has really nice written articles valid for other distros.
*   [Digital Ocean Tutorials](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials) - 6,000+ tutorials for getting the basics of certain applications/tools/systems administration topics.
items.content_html:
Websites / Web

  • ArchWiki - Arch Linux Wiki which has really nice written articles valid for other distros.
  • Digital Ocean Tutorials - 6,000+ tutorials for getting the basics of certain applications/tools/systems administration topics.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Meta-Level Considerations / The Aha! Moment

*   [Multiple Causes of Difficulty in Insight: The Case of the Nine-Dot Problem](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Trina-Kershaw/publication/8909474_Multiple_Causes_of_Difficulty_in_Insight_The_Case_of_the_Nine-Dot_Problem/links/55dca27e08aeb38e8a8d23b6/Multiple-Causes-of-Difficulty-in-Insight-The-Case-of-the-Nine-Dot-Problem.pdf) - ***Journal of Experimental Psychology***, 2004. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=15600199808825346018\&hl=en\&as_sdt=0,5)]. \[[APA](https://psycnet.apa.org/record/2003-10949-001)].
items.content_html:
Meta-Level Considerations / The Aha! Moment

  • Multiple Causes of Difficulty in Insight: The Case of the Nine-Dot Problem - Journal of Experimental Psychology, 2004. [All Versions]. [APA].

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [bellybutton (⭐273)](https://github.com/hchasestevens/bellybutton) — A linting engine supporting custom project-specific rules.
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • bellybutton (⭐273) — A linting engine supporting custom project-specific rules.

items.title: Awesome Bash
items.content_text:
### Command-Line Productivity

*   [ble.sh (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/akinomyoga/ble.sh) - User-friendly and feature rich readline replacement, with syntax highlighting, better command completion, and improved multi-line editing.
items.content_html:
Command-Line Productivity

  • ble.sh (⭐3.4k) - User-friendly and feature rich readline replacement, with syntax highlighting, better command completion, and improved multi-line editing.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [vue-use-fixed-header (⭐67)](https://github.com/smastrom/vue-use-fixed-header) - Turn your boring fixed header into a smart one.
*   [zoom-image](https://willnguyen1312.github.io/zoom-image/) - A little yet powerful framework agnostic library to zoom image on the web
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • vue-use-fixed-header (⭐67) - Turn your boring fixed header into a smart one.
  • zoom-image - A little yet powerful framework agnostic library to zoom image on the web

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [HiPhish/rainbow-delimiters.nvim (⭐737)](https://github.com/HiPhish/rainbow-delimiters.nvim) - Rainbow delimiters with Tree-sitter.
*   [okuuva/auto-save.nvim (⭐256)](https://github.com/okuuva/auto-save.nvim) - Automatically saves your work as often as needed and as seldom as possible. Customizable with smart defaults. Maintained fork of Pocco81/auto-save.nvim.
items.content_html:
Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • HiPhish/rainbow-delimiters.nvim (⭐737) - Rainbow delimiters with Tree-sitter.
  • okuuva/auto-save.nvim (⭐256) - Automatically saves your work as often as needed and as seldom as possible. Customizable with smart defaults. Maintained fork of Pocco81/auto-save.nvim.

items.title: Awesome Cryptography
items.content_text:
### Rust / Git

*   [cryptoballot (⭐222)](https://github.com/cryptoballot/cryptoballot) - Cryptographically secure online voting.
items.content_html:
Rust / Git

  • cryptoballot (⭐222) - Cryptographically secure online voting.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

*   [Multi-agent Simulation by Jim Fan on Twitter](https://twitter.com/DrJimFan/status/1682086586593443841): "The next frontier of emergent intelligence will be multi-agent simulation: a crowd of AI characters carry out their daily lives through complex social interactions"
items.content_html:
Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

  • Multi-agent Simulation by Jim Fan on Twitter: "The next frontier of emergent intelligence will be multi-agent simulation: a crowd of AI characters carry out their daily lives through complex social interactions"

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Tools / Community providers

items.content_html:
Tools / Community providers

  • terragrunt-atlantis-config (⭐698) - Generate Atlantis config for Terragrunt projects.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Goroutines

*   [flowmatic (⭐388)](https://github.com/carlmjohnson/flowmatic) - Structured concurrency made easy.

### Query Language

*   [grapher (⭐4)](https://github.com/reaganiwadha/grapher) - A GraphQL field builder utilizing Go generics with extra utilities and features.
items.content_html:
Goroutines

  • flowmatic (⭐388) - Structured concurrency made easy.

Query Language

  • grapher (⭐4) - A GraphQL field builder utilizing Go generics with extra utilities and features.
